questions.question: why did Caroline go to Egypt?

choices.answer: Because she was interested in sharks.

questions.question: Why did she ask the instructor how deep the water was?

choices.answer: She was really worried about her hair.
Because she didn't have any experience of diving below 30 m.

questions.question: How did she feel when they got to the reef? Why?

choices.answer: She was shocked because there were a lot of sharks.
She was scared because it was very deep.
She was scared because she had a terrible pain.
She was very happy because  she likes to dive in the depth.

questions.question: Why didn't Caroline to go back up to the surface of the water fast?

choices.answer: Because she didn't want to get 'the bends'.
Because she didn't want that the instructor saw her.
Because she didn't want to die.
Because she didn't want to get the attention.
